name: Messbook
tagline: Its a Hostel mess management Desktop software modeled on the real world working of a real mess payment system.
body:
# MessBook
Its a project based on SWT (Standard Window Toolkit) JAVA.

Its a Hostel mess management Desktop software modeled on the real world working of a real mess payment system.
The application is multi threaded and can run on 

  1.Windows (all versions).
  
  2.Linux (tested on Ubuntu & elementary os(GTK 2)).

It also prints the recipt.  
 
Import Messbook.sql in your MySql DB and run the respective file. (Schema name- mydb)
